text: Farah (Pashto/Persian: فراه) is a city in western Afghanistan. It is the capital of Farah Province. There are about 109,409 people living here. It is at 650 m altitude. It is on the Farah River. ==Economy and transportation== The city is a major trading and farming center in the area. There is an airport with a paved runway. Category:Cities in Afghanistan Category:Farah Province
title: Farah, Afghanistan
